QueryResult.text: select odf_ca_odf_im00000002_clrty.id object_instance_id, a.user_id from cmn_sec_chk_user_v0 a, odf_ca_odf_im00000002_clrty where a.object_id = 5024984 and a.permission_code = 'READ' and a.object_instance_id = odf_ca_odf_im00000002_clrty.id UNION select odf_ca_odf_im00000002_clrty.id object_instance_id, a.user_id from cmn_sec_chk_user_v0 a, odf_ca_odf_im00000002_clrty where a.object_id in (null) and a.permission_code = 'READ' and a.object_instance_id = odf_ca_odf_im00000002_clrty.odf_parent_id
